mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment ( payment_id, reservation_id, enrollment_id, amount, payment_date, payment_status ) VALUES ( #{payment_id}, #{reservation_id}, #{enrollment_id}, #{amount}, #{payment_date}, #{payment_status} )
mapper.select: select * from enrollment e join class c using(class_id)
mapper.update: update enrollment set enrollment_status ='승인대기' where enrollment_id = #{enrollment_id}
mapper.select: SELECT r.user_id FROM payment p JOIN rental r ON p.rental_id = r.rental_id WHERE p.payment_id = #{payment_id}
SELECT c.class_name FROM payment p JOIN reservation r ON p.reservation_id = r.reservation_id JOIN class c ON r.court_id = c.facility_id WHERE p.payment_id = #{payment_id}
SELECT u.email FROM payment p JOIN rental r ON p.rental_id = r.rental_id JOIN user u ON r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE p.payment_id = #{payment_id}
